active.name: Blink
active.desc:
Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. 

Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

passive.Pierce: Grants each attack a 25% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 80 bonus magical damage.

active.name: Chop Tree
active.desc:
Destroy a target tree. 

Cast Range: 350

passive.Quell: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 18 for melee heroes, and 5 for ranged.

passive.Magical Damage Block:
Consumes a charge to block 120 magic damage from damage instances over 50 damage. 

Comes with 6 charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.

passive.Damage Block: Grants a 50% chance to block 20 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 8 damage on ranged.

passive.Lifesteal: Heals the attacker for 15% of attack damage dealt.

passive.True Sight: Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 900 range of its carrier.
passive.Everlasting: Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.

active.name: Energy Charge
active.desc:
Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored.

 Max 10 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

active.name: Energy Charge
active.desc:
Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored. 

Max 20 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

active.name: Ghost Form
active.desc: You enter ghost form for 4 seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and -40% more vulnerable to magic damage.

active.name: Regenerate
active.desc:
Consumes a charge to restore 125 health and 75 mana over 2.5 seconds. If the hero is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

The Bottle automatically refills at the fountain.

Hold Control to use on an allied hero.

Range: 350

passive.Store Rune:
Runes can be stored in the bottle for later use by right-clicking them. Unused runes will automatically activate after 2 minutes.

Using a stored rune fully refills the Bottle.

active.name: Phase
active.desc: Gives 22% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and 10% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units and turn more quickly for 3 seconds.

active.name: Switch Attribute
active.desc: Switches between +10 Strength, +10 Agility, or +10 Intelligence.

active.name: Transmute
active.desc:
Kills a non-hero target for 160 gold and 1.85x experience. 

 Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.

Range: 600

passive.Damage Block:
Gives a 100% chance to block 30 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 20 damage on ranged.

Has a 50% chance to block damage from creeps.

active.name: Restore
active.desc: Heals 275 health to allied units in a 1200 radius.

passive.Mekansm Aura: Grants 2.5 health regeneration to allied units in a 1200 radius.

passive.Vladmir's Aura:
Grants 25% lifesteal, 1.5 mana regeneration, and 3 armor to nearby allies. 

Radius: 1200

passive.Buckler Aura:
Grants 2.5 armor to allied player units.

Radius: 1200

passive.Basilius Aura:
Grants 1.4 mana regeneration to allies.  

Radius: 1200

active.name: Energy Charge
active.desc:
Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored. 

Max 20 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

active.name: Barrier
active.desc:
Gives a shield that blocks 400 magic damage to all nearby allies. Lasts 12 seconds.

Radius: 1200

passive.Insight Aura:
Gives allied units 2.5 health regeneration and 10% magic resistance.

Radius: 1200

active.name: Soul Release
active.desc:
Provides 30 health regeneration when cast on allies, and deals 25 damage per second when cast on enemies. 

Lasts 8 seconds.  

Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units.  Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.

Cast Range: 950

passive.Regeneration Aura:
Grants 2.5 health regeneration to allies.

Radius: 1200

active.name: Hex
active.desc:
Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. The target has a base movement speed of 140 and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed.
Instantly destroys illusions.

Range: 800

active.name: Soul Burn
active.desc:
Silences the target unit for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, 30% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.

Range: 900

active.name: Soul Rend
active.desc:
Silences a target for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional 30% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magical damage.

All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and 100% chance to crit for 130% damage.

Range: 900

passive.Echo Strike: Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 100% movement slow for 0.8 seconds on each strike.

active.name: Cyclone
active.desc:
Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself.

Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.

Range: 575
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

passive.Aethereal Focus: Increases targeted spell and item cast range by 250.

active.name: Force
active.desc:
Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing.

Range: 550

active.name: Hurricane Thrust
active.desc:
Pushes you and target enemy 450 units away from each other, and for 5 seconds, allows you to make 4 attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +100 attack speed.

Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.

Allied Range: 550
Enemy Range: 400

passive.Dragon's Reach: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.

active.name: Energy Burst
active.desc:
Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit.

Damage: 400,500,600,700,800
Range: 600 650 700 750 800
Mana Cost: 120,140,160,180,200

active.name: Demonic Summoning
active.desc:
Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 60 seconds.

Warrior:

Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. Gains True Sight at level 3. Health: 700,800,900 Damage: 75,100,125 Mana Break Damage: 30,40,50 Last Will Damage: 600,700,800

Archer:

Has a passive movement and attack speed aura. Gains Purge at Level 3. Health: 700,800,900 Damage: 60,90,120 Aura Move Speed: 5,7,9 Aura Attack Speed: 5,10,15 Aura Radius: 1200

passive.Ability Upgrade: Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.
Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.

active.name: Reset Cooldowns
active.desc: Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

passive.Assault Aura:
Grants 25 attack speed and 5 armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by -5.

Radius: 1200

passive.Health Regeneration:
Restores 5% of max health per second. 

If damage is taken from an enemy hero or Roshan, this ability is disabled for 5 seconds for melee heroes, or 7 seconds for ranged heroes.

active.name: Avatar
active.desc:
Grants Spell Immunity.  Duration decreases with each use. 

Duration: 10,9,8,7,6,5 
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

passive.Reincarnation:
Brings you to life with full health and mana 5 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. 

Reincarnation must be used within 5 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).

active.name: Arctic Blast
active.desc:
Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4 seconds.

Radius: 900

passive.Freezing Aura:
Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by -45. 

Radius: 1200

active.name: Bloodpact
active.desc: Converts 30% of your max mana to health regeneration over 2 seconds.

passive.Mana Battery: Each charge provides 0.2 MP regen and 0.35% Spell Amp. Nearby kills provide 1 charges. Dying causes you to lose 3 charges. Starts with 14 charges. Provides +100% Mana Regen Amplification.

active.name: Transfer Spellblock
active.desc:
Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit for 12 seconds.

Range: 700

passive.Spellblock: Blocks most targeted spells once every 12 seconds.

active.name: Echo Shell
active.desc:
Applies a shield to the target unit for 6 seconds which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster.

The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell. 

Range: 900
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

active.name: Meteor Hammer
active.desc:
CHANNELED - After a successful channel, summons a meteor that strikes a 315 AoE, stunning enemies for 2 seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage over time to enemies units and buildings for 6 seconds.

Building Impact Damage: 75 
Building Over Time Damage: 50 

Non-Building Impact Damage: 150 
Non-Building Over Time Damage: 90 

Channel Duration: 2.5 seconds.
Landing Time: 0.5 seconds.

active.name: Nullify
active.desc:
Dispels the target and applies a debuff for 5 seconds. Continuously dispels the target. Anytime the target is attacked, it will be slowed by 80% for 0.5 seconds.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

passive.Combo Breaker: When you take damage and your health falls below 70%, a strong dispel is applied and you gain a 2.5 second buff that provides +75% Status Resistance and causes all damage you deal and are dealt to be reduced to zero. Only triggers on player based damage.

active.name: Soul Release
active.desc:
When used against enemies, it reduces health by 4% of current health per second, and reduces HP regeneration and healing by 60%. Deals 25 damage per second. 

When used on allies, it provides 30 health regeneration per second. 

Lasts 8 seconds.  

Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units.  Only the closest Spirit Vessel to the dying hero will gain a charge.

Cast Range: 950

passive.Damage Block: Grants a 50% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.

active.name: Guard
active.desc:
For 12 seconds, grant nearby allied heroes and buildings a 100% chance to block 60 damage from each incoming attack.

Units may only be affected by Guard once every 46 seconds.

Radius: 1200

passive.Damage Block: Grants a 50% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.

active.name: Damage Return
active.desc: For 4.5 seconds, duplicates any damage taken back to the unit that dealt the damage.

active.name: Barrier
active.desc: Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to 325 magical damage.  Lasts 12 seconds.

passive.Everlasting:
Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed. 

Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up and is killed. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.

passive.Pierce: Grants each attack a 75% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 100 bonus magical damage.

passive.Critical Strike: Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal 225% damage.

passive.Bash: Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.5 seconds and deal 100 bonus physical damage.  Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.

active.name: Chop Tree
active.desc:
Destroy a target tree.

Cast Range: 350

passive.Quell: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 18 for melee heroes, and 5 for ranged.
passive.Cleave: Deals 70% of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to 650 around the target. Deals 50% against creeps. (Melee Only)

active.name: Mirror Image
active.desc:
Creates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds. 

Melee images deal 33% damage and take 350% damage, while Ranged images deal 28% and take 400% damage. 

Cooldown increased by 15 seconds on ranged heroes.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

passive.Critical Strike: Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal 160% damage.

passive.Dragon's Reach: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.

active.name: Shadow Walk
active.desc:
Makes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units.  

If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus physical damage on that attack.

active.name: Shadow Walk
active.desc:
Makes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While invisible, you move 25% faster and can move through units.  

Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 175 bonus physical damage to the target, and for 4 seconds, disable their passive abilities and heal and regeneration by 50%.

active.name: Unholy Rage
active.desc: Increases Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 5 seconds.

passive.Lifesteal: Heals the attacker for 25% of attack damage dealt.

active.name: Static Charge
active.desc:
Places a charged shield on a target unit for 15 seconds which has a 20% chance to release a 200 magical damage shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and 4 additional enemies.

Range: 800

passive.Chain Lightning: Grants a 25% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 12 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 170 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.

passive.Cold Attack: Attacks lower enemy movement and attack speed for 3 seconds. Slows enemy ranged units by -45% movement speed and by -45 attack speed. Slows enemy melee units by -20% movement speed and by -20 attack speed.

active.name: Dominate
active.desc:
Takes control of one neutral, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to 425 and max health to a minimum of 1500.

Dominated units with a max health of greater than 1500 retain their original max health.  Dominated unit's bounty is set to 200 gold.

Range: 700

passive.Dominator Aura:
Increases nearby allied hero and player units base damage by 20%  and health regen by 5. Has a 50%  bigger effect on player units.

Radius: 1200

passive.Chain Lightning: Grants a 25% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 140 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.

passive.Corruption: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by -6 for 7 seconds.

active.name: Berserk
active.desc: Gives 110 attack speed and 30 movement speed, but reduces your armor by 8 and silences you.  Lasts 6 seconds.

passive.Lifesteal: Heals the attacker for 20% of attack damage dealt.

active.name: Inhibit
active.desc:
Targets an enemy, slowing it for 4 seconds.

Range: 600

passive.Manabreak:
Each attack burns 40 mana from the target, and deals 0.8 physical damage per burned mana. 

Burns 16 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions.

active.name: Ether Blast
active.desc:
Converts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and -40% more vulnerable to magic damage.  Lasts for 4 seconds on allies and 4 seconds on enemies.

  Enemy targets are also slowed by -80%, and take 1.5x your primary attribute + 125 as magical damage.

Range: 800

active.name: Sacrifice
active.desc:
Consume 170 health to temporarily gain 150 mana.  Lasts 10 seconds.

If the mana gained cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.

active.name: Replenish Mana
active.desc:
Restores 160 mana to all nearby allies.

Radius: 1200

passive.Cooldown Reduction: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.
passive.Spell Lifesteal:
25% of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type.  

Lifesteal reduced to 5% against creeps.

passive.Poison Attack: Poisons the target, dealing 2 magical damage per second and slowing movement by -15% if the equipped hero is melee, or by -4% if they are ranged. Lasts for 3 seconds.

passive.Lesser Corruption: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by -2 for 8 seconds.

active.name: Endurance
active.desc:
Gives +35 attack speed and +13% movement speed to nearby allies for 6 seconds. 

Radius: 1200

passive.Speed Aura:
Increases nearby allies' attack speed by 20.

Radius: 1200

active.name: Valor
active.desc:
If cast on an ally, grants them the 5 armor, and removing it from the caster. 

If cast on an enemy, reduces 5 armor on both the enemy and the caster. 

Cannot target spell immune enemies.

Range: 1000

active.name: Shine
active.desc:
When cast on an ally, grants them 8 armor, 80 attack speed, and 10% movement speed. When cast on an enemy, removes 8 armor, 80 attack speed, and 10% movement speed.

Removes the armor from the caster when used. 

 Cannot target spell immune enemies.

Range: 1000

active.name: Magic Weakness
active.desc:
Cast a 600 radius blast that causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from spells.

Range: 1000
Duration: 16 seconds.

passive.Basilius Aura:
Grants 1.5 mana regeneration to allies.  

Radius: 1200

active.name: Mend
active.desc:
Restores 300 health and 200 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative effects from the caster.

Radius: 1200
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

passive.Guardian Aura:
Provides 2.5 health regeneration to allied units. If an allied hero's health falls below 20%, they receive 16 health regeneration and 10 armor. 

Radius: 1200

active.name: Cripple
active.desc:
Roots the target for 2 seconds.

Range: 1100

active.name: Chop
active.desc:
Targets a non-player enemy unit to remove 50% of its current HP.

If cast on a tree, instantly destroys it.

Unit Range: 350
Tree Range: %abilitycastrange%

active.name: Overwhelm
active.desc:
Blinks to and stuns a target enemy unit for 2 seconds. 

Pierces Spell Immunity.

Range: 600

passive.Bash: Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.5 seconds and deal 100 bonus physical damage.  Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.
passive.Damage Block: Grants a 50% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.

active.name: Disarm
active.desc:
Prevents a target from attacking for 3 seconds on melee targets, and 5 seconds on ranged targets.

Range: 600

passive.Aquila Aura:
Grants 1.25 mana regeneration and 2 armor to nearby allies.

Radius: 1200

passive.Break: Whenever you attack a hero or are attacked by any unit, the bonus 14 HP regen is lost and the movement speed bonus is reduced to 18% for 13 seconds.

active.name: Fade
active.desc:
Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero as long as the target unit remains still.  

Has a 1.25 second fade time, and breaks instantly upon moving. 

There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.

Range: 600

active.name: Glimmer
active.desc:
After a 0.6 second delay, grants invisibility and 45% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit for 5 seconds.

Range: 550

Can be cast while channelling.

active.name: Blink
active.desc: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.

passive.Magic Amp: Reduces magic resistance of the attacked enemy by 12%.

passive.Cooldown Reduction: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 13%

active.name: Force
active.desc: Dispels the user and pushes them 600 units in the direction they are facing.

passive.Speed Unlock: Completely removes the speed limit for the wearer

passive.Greater Corruption: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by -10 for 7 seconds.

passive.Rebirth: Lethal damage is prevented and instead the wearer is healed to half health and non-ultimate ability cooldowns reset. Gets consumed on trigger.

passive.Echo Shield: Block and reflect most targeted spells back to their caster once every 8 seconds.

passive.Silence Strike: The next attack silences the hit enemy for 1.5 seconds.

passive.True Sight: Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 500 range of its carrier.
passive.Charge Loss: Loses a charge on death. After all charges are lost, the item disappears.

passive.Cooldown Reduction: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 20%.

passive.Hex Strike: The next attack hexes the hit enemy into a frog for 1.5 seconds.

passive.Critical Strike: Empowers your next attack, causing it to be a critical strike dealing 130% damage.

active.name: Flicker
active.desc: Dispells debuffs and blinks you to a random spot within 600 range. Does not get disabled on incoming damage.

passive.Prescient Aura: Lowers Scan cooldown by 50% . Increases attack and cast range of allies in a 1200 unit radius.

active.name: Scurry
active.desc: Grants you 24% bonus movement speed and free pathing for 3 seconds. Walking over trees causes them to be destroyed.

passive.Death Delay: Survive for an extra 5 seconds after receiving a killing blow.

active.name: Blink Strike
active.desc:
Targets a unit to teleport to them. Knocks enemies back 250 distance and disables them for 1 second. 

Range: 1600

passive.Water Regen: Provides you with 8 HP regen and 4 mana regen while in the river.

active.name: Dig
active.desc:
Channel for %abilitychanneltime% second. 
Can find a Bounty Rune, a Flask, a 2 charged TP Scroll bundle, or an enemy Kobold.

passive.Afterburn: Causes attacks to burn the enemy, dealing 18 damage per second for 3 seconds. Affects buildings.

active.name: Life Essence
active.desc: Increases your current and max health by 425 for 15 seconds.

active.name: Ensnare
active.desc:
Ensnares the target enemy and yourself for 1.75 seconds.

 Range: 650

passive.Certain Strike: Empowers your next attack with 300 bonus magical damage and True Strike. Ranged Attackers have +400 bonus range for the attack.

active.name: Solitary Disguise
active.desc: Casts Smoke of Deceit on yourself only.

active.name: Create Illusion
active.desc: Creates an image under your control.

passive.Illusion Mastery: Increases outgoing damage of all units and illusions controlled by the hero by 10%.

active.name: Havoc
active.desc: Knocks back enemies in 350 range around you, slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds and dealing 250 + 1x your str as magical damage.

passive.Rejuvenate: When the wearer's health falls below 20%, they will receive a hard dispel and be healed for 300 health.

passive.Knockback: Knocks back enemies 50 distance and deals 40 pure damage with every attack.

active.name: Woodland Stride
active.desc: Create a path of trees behind you for 3 seconds. Trees last up to 15 seconds.

passive.Tree Walking: Removes movement speed limit and allows free pathing through trees.

active.name: Greater Demonic Summoning
active.desc: Summon 2 sets of Level 3 Necronomicon Units that last 75 seconds. Units have 50% more health and damage.

active.name: Fallen Sky
active.desc:
Transform into a meteor that strikes down at the target area after 0.5 seconds in a 315 AoE, stunning enemies for 2 seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage every 1 seconds to enemy units and buildings for 6 seconds.

Building Impact Damage: 75 
Building Over Time Damage: 50 

Non-Building Impact Damage: 150 
Non-Building Over Time Damage: 90

 Range: 1600

passive.Kill Bounty: Steals 300 gold when you kill an enemy hero.

active.name: Reset Item Cooldowns
active.desc: Reset the cooldown on all items (except Refresher Orb).

passive.Greater Healing: Amplifies the wearer's Regeneration, Healing and Lifesteal by 17%.

active.name: Lesser Avatar
active.desc: Grants Spell Immunity for 2 seconds.

passive.Impeding Corruption: Attacks reduce the target's armor and movement speed. Slow amount varies based on whether the wearer is melee or ranged.

active.name: Replenish Mana
active.desc:
Restores 75 mana to all nearby allies. 

 Radius: 1200
